mapper.sql: Id, FileName, FileNo, SecretLeve, Promoter, Auditperson, ApprovalPeople, GenerateTime, StartDepartment, StartOffices, Isdelete, UserId, ImporTime

a.Id, a.FileName, a.FileNo, a.SecretLeve, a.Promoter, a.Auditperson, a.ApprovalPeople, date_format(a.GenerateTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') GenerateTime, a.StartDepartment, a.StartOffices, a.Isdelete, a.UserId, date_format(a.ImporTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ImporTime
mapper.select:
select distinct
from oa_levelintegrate a left join bm_staff_tbl s on a.Promoter = s.AccoutName left join organization o on s.DeptId = o.UniqueID
a.Isdelete = 0
and a.Promoter in (select AccoutName FROM bm_staff_tbl where DeptId = #{orgId})
and a.Promoter = #{userAccount}
and a.FileName like CONCAT('%',#{fileName},'%')
and a.SecretLeve = #{level}
mapper.delete: update oa_levelintegrate set Isdelete = 1 where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into oa_levelintegrate (Id, FileName, FileNo, SecretLeve, Promoter, Auditperson, ApprovalPeople, GenerateTime, StartDepartment, StartOffices, Isdelete, UserId, ImporTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secretleve,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{promoter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalpeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, str_to_date(#{generatetime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{startdepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startoffices,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW())

mapper.update:
update oa_levelintegrate
FileName = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FileNo = #{fileno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SecretLeve = #{secretleve,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Promoter = #{promoter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Auditperson = #{auditperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ApprovalPeople = #{approvalpeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GenerateTime = str_to_date(#{generatetime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
StartDepartment = #{startdepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
StartOffices = #{startoffices,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UserId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ImporTime = str_to_date(#{importime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update oa_levelintegrate set FileName = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FileNo = #{fileno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SecretLeve = #{secretleve,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Promoter = #{promoter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Auditperson = #{auditperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ApprovalPeople = #{approvalpeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GenerateTime = #{generatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, StartDepartment = #{startdepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, StartOffices = #{startoffices,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UserId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ImporTime = #{importime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
